title: A Day to remember
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Department of the Attorney-General, partner
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Wildfires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural disasters
abstract: Jo spent her 21st birthday on duty as a CFA firefighter, in the 'Black Saturday' bushfires of February 2009.
description: A young CFA volunteer who spent her 21st birthday on duty during the bushfires of February 2009. Her entire family is involved in the CFA as volunteer firefighters. She speaks about the poignancy of seeing an Australian flag on a resident's home during 'Black Saturday'.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2001359; Stories from the Bushfires; Active; 2009
